parameterDecorators.name: access
parameterDecorators.description: TRUE if the Watcher was given permissions, FALSE if permissions were removed.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Home contract for the Replica.

parameterDecorators.name: access
parameterDecorators.description: TRUE if the Watcher was given permissions, FALSE if permissions were removed.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Home contract for the Replica.

parameterDecorators.name: access
parameterDecorators.description: TRUE if the Watcher was given permissions, FALSE if permissions were removed.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Home contract for the Replica.

functionDecorators.name: checkBalance
functionDecorators.description: Get the total asset value held in the platform.

returnDecorators.name: balance
returnDecorators.description: Total value of the asset in the platform.

functionDecorators.name: claimGovernance
functionDecorators.description: Claim Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`). Can only be called by the new Governor.

functionDecorators.name: collectRewardTokens
functionDecorators.description: Collect stkAave, convert it to AAVE send to Vault.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Deposit asset into Aave.

functionDecorators.name: depositAll
functionDecorators.description: Deposit the entire balance of any supported asset into Aave.

functionDecorators.name: getRewardTokenAddresses
functionDecorators.description: Get the reward token addresses.

functionDecorators.name: governor
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current Governor.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initializer for setting up strategy internal state. This overrides the InitializableAbstractStrategy initializer as AAVE needs several extra addresses for the rewards program.

parameterDecorators.name: _incentivesAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the AAVE incentives controller.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Internal initialize function, to set up initial internal state.

parameterDecorators.name: _rewardTokenAddresses
parameterDecorators.description: Address of reward token for platform.

functionDecorators.name: isGovernor
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the caller is the current Governor.

functionDecorators.name: removePToken
functionDecorators.description: Remove a supported asset by passing its index. This method can only be called by the system Governor.

parameterDecorators.name: _assetIndex
parameterDecorators.description: Index of the asset to be removed.

functionDecorators.name: safeApproveAllTokens
functionDecorators.description: Approve the spending of all assets by their corresponding aToken, if for some reason is it necessary.

functionDecorators.name: setHarvesterAddress
functionDecorators.description: Set the reward token addresses.

functionDecorators.name: setPTokenAddress
functionDecorators.description: Provide support for asset by passing its pToken address. This method can only be called by the system Governor.

parameterDecorators.name: _pToken
parameterDecorators.description: Address for the corresponding platform token.

functionDecorators.name: setRewardTokenAddresses
functionDecorators.description: Set the reward token addresses.

parameterDecorators.name: _rewardTokenAddresses
parameterDecorators.description: Address array of the reward token.

functionDecorators.name: supportsAsset
functionDecorators.description: Retuns bool indicating whether asset is supported by strategy.

functionDecorators.name: transferGovernance
functionDecorators.description: Transfers Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`). Can only be called by the current Governor. Must be claimed for this to complete.

functionDecorators.name: transferToken
functionDecorators.description: Transfer token to governor. Intended for recovering tokens stuck in strategy contracts, i.e. mistaken sends.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of the asset to transfer.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw asset from Aave.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawAll
functionDecorators.description: Remove all assets from platform and send them to Vault contract.
